review: We are really enjoying the Amazon firestick. We love movies and hav found many TV series we enjoy.

review: This little device is a "must have" !! Easy to install, easy to use.. Definately recommend !!

review: This works great.Our router/modem is on the other side of the house and this still works perfectly with no lag at all.If you are an Amazon Prime member, you can't go wrong with picking one or more of these up.

review: So easy to set up & use

review: Roku receives wifi signal much better, don't bother with this and stick with Roku.
